mapper.sql: ID, NAME, ZH_NAME, US_NAME, ACOMMODATION_TYPE, TOURIST_HOTEL_LEVEL, BRAND, HOTEL_ORGANIZATION, HONOR_QUALIFICATION, PHONE, FAX, WEBSITE_URL, WAP_URL, OFFOCOAL_PUBLIC_SPACE, REGION, ADDRESS, POSTCODE, ELECTRONIC_MAP, TRAFFIC_DESCRIPTION, GUEST_ROOM_NUMBER, TOTAL_BED_NUMBER, OPENING_TIME, DECORATE_TIME, ARCHITECTURAL_STYLE, PAY_METHOD, FACCILITIES_SERVICES, DINING_SERVICES, ENTERTAINMENT_SERVICES, BUSINESS_SERVICES, ROOM_SERVICES, PARKING_INFOMATION, CORPORATE, SKETCH_PICTURE, PICTURE_LIBRARY, VIDEO_LIBRARY, VIRTUAL_MATERIAL, STATUS, VCODE, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, MAP_TYPE, LICENSE, SIMPLE_NAME, EMAIL, LEGAL_PERSON, LEGAL_PHONE, PRESIDE, PRESIDE_PHONE, BIGBED, DOUBLE_ROOM, THREE_PERSON_ROOM, MANY_PERSON_ROOM, DISABLED_PERSON_ROOM, CHINESE_RESTAURANT, WERSTERN_RESTAURANT, RESTURANT_COUNT, DATEFROM, MULTI_FUNCTIONAL_CANTEEN, SEATS, REGISTER_TYPE, REGISTER_TIME, DECIDE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, SORT, APARTMENT_TYPE, CHECK_PRICE, CHECK_PRICE_TIME, PLAY_SIGN, SIGN_720, RESOURCE_CODE, PIC_URL_360, INTRODUCTION, HOTEL_VHTYPE
mapper.select:
select
from res_accommodation
AND vcode = #{vcode} AND STATUS != -1
AND name LIKE '%${name}%'
ORDER BY ID DESC

update res_accommodation
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZH_NAME = #{zhName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
US_NAME = #{usName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACOMMODATION_TYPE = #{acommodationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CHECK_PRICE_TIME = #{checkPriceTime,jdbcType=DATE},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
